{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WPNT834 |revision= |upc=606449048353 |ean= |asin=B000BZ1K9E |price= |est_release_date=12/2005 |fcc_date=10/24/2005 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=less common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=SA3-AGN3023MX0100 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8651B |cpu1_cspeed=200 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320ABTC-90G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ProMOS |ram1_model=V54C3128164VBI7 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Airgo AGN3023MX-01 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI (long) |wi1_chip1_brand=Airgo |wi1_chip1_model=AGN303BB |wi1_chip2_brand=Airgo |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand=Airgo |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=ROME; |stock_os=Î¼Clinux;2.4.26-uc0; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=NETGEAR |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:14:6C |oui_eth=00:14:6C }} ''RangeMax 240 Mbps Wireless Router''
{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WPNT834|vs_id=2625}} Some internal pictures are available [http://trash.uid0.hu/openwrt/wpnt834/ here]. The device uses the Airgo AGN300 chipset. Two of the antennas are stationary and non-removable, but there is one RP-SMA connector. ==Additional external links== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:netgear:wpnt834 On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
